project.description:
Build bll-freebsd-baseonly target
Run Unit test testbase
Create directory structure needed for the Tarball
Create tar.gz file
Call the FTP tarball job which copies the Tarball over to Martin
Wait 1 hr to keep from having a resource conflict

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: major minor version TODO: get this from a file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BLL_BUILD_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is used to pass a common build number to all IL and BLL build jobs run during the nightly build process.

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [ "$BUILD_RUN_UNITTEST" = "true" ]; then echo $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR cd $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR:.: python $WORKSPACE/framework/tools/testRunner/testRunner.py testbase fi

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import os
if os.environ['BLL_BUILD_NUMBER']=='BAD_BUILD_NUMBER': os.environ['BLL_BUILD_NUMBER' ]= os.environ['BUILD_NUMBER']
bll_build_number=os.environ['BLL_BUILD_NUMBER' ] fullnum= "00" + bll_build_number + "30000" fullver = "00" + bll_build_number + "3" print "bll build number is " + bll_build_number if int(bll_build_number) > 9: print "bll_build_number: greater than 9" fullnum = "0" + bll_build_number + "30000" fullver = "0" + bll_build_number + "3" if int(bll_build_number) > 99: print "bll_build_number: greater than 9" fullnum = bll_build_number + "30000" fullver = bll_build_number + "3"
print "fullnum: " + fullnum print "fullver: " + fullver
paramfile = open(os.environ['WORKSPACE'] + "/properties.txt", "w") paramfile.write("SOURCE_OS=FreeBSD\n") paramfile.write("BLL_BUILD_NUMBER=" + bll_build_number + "\n") paramfile.close()
stc_maj_min_version=os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION' ] build_output_dir=os.environ['BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR' ] print "build_output_dir: " + build_output_dir os.system("cd") os.chdir(build_output_dir) os.system("cd") print "python ../../../../../framework/tools/buildUtil/setver.py " + stc_maj_min_version + " " + fullnum os.system("python ../../../../../framework/tools/buildUtil/setver.py " + stc_maj_min_version + " " + fullnum);

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -d Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION ]; then echo "Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION exists!" else mkdir Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION fi cd Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION
if [ -d Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD ]; then echo "Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD exists!" else mkdir Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD fi cd Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD/ # rm -r $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD/* cp -r $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/HelpInfo $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD cp -r $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/Templates $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD cp -r $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/Model $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD cp -f $WORKSPACE/framework/bll/core/install/release/ILVersion.xml $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD cp -f $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/stcbll.ini $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD
for file in .tcl .pl .pm .py .a .so .xml .so* ;do if ( ls $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/*$file >/dev/null) then echo "$file file exists!" cp -f $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/*$file $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD/ else echo "There are no files matching the pattern: $file to copy!" fi done
for file in test*.xml correct*.xml source*.xml test*.tcl correct*.tcl unused*.tcl lib*.a stcFtpd.tcl tclCmdline.tcl tclFtpd.tcl ;do if ( ls $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD/$file >/dev/null) then echo "$file file exists!" rm -f $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD/$file else echo "There are no files matching the pattern: $file to delete!" fi done
sudo chmod a+rx $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION sudo chmod -R o+rw $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION sudo chmod -R a+rw $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION

rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD55_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz if [ -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz ]; then echo removing Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz else echo Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz does not exist. fi tar cvf Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION gzip Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar mv Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD55_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz echo Finished creating tar files
